data.description: Arts Beacon is dedicated to providing exceptional art education for our students and career advancement and opportunities for our resident artists.

body.html: Arts Beacon is dedicated to providing exceptional art education for our students and career advancement and opportunities for our resident artists.

Arts Beacon Mission

We strive to be a beacon in our community with exceptional art education, inspiring exhibitions and to provide supportive environment for our resident artists. Arts Beacon's team is made up of resident artists. Our resident artists learn, teach, exhibit, curate and critique together. We share our collective knowledge with each other so we can improve our art practice, guide our students and inspire our community. Our foundational teaching philosophy is to develop creative thinking while teaching students to develop a rich visual aesthetic.

Learn more about our Fall 2021 Class offerings. We are excited to offer lessons in person with several new instructors.

See all of our classes here.

description.html:
Kids Classes

Lessons available in person, masks required.

Teens Classes

Lessons available in person, vaccination required for 12 and up.

Adult Classes

Lessons available in person, vaccination required for adult students.

title.text: Stay informed about studio events or class changes!

body.html:
We've opened a gallery!

Arts Beacon Gallery is a small experimental art gallery and event space. Our resident artists create, collaborate and experiment developing new ideas in a supportive community of artists.

View the gallery website at artsbeacongallery.com

Arts Beacon's team is made up of resident artists. Our resident artists learn, teach, exhibit, curate and critique together. We share our collective knowledge with each other so we can improve our art practice, guide our students and inspire our community. Our foundational teaching philosophy is to develop creative thinking while teaching students to develop a rich visual aesthetic.

Learn more about our current artists below.

Jena is the founder Arts Beacon Studio and co-founder of Arts Beacon Gallery. She is the director of the studio program and lead instructor for the teen, adult program. She also leads the resident artist program and the Atlanta women's critique group program. Jena's specialty is in portfolio development, artist mentoring, observational drawing, figure drawing and handbuilt ceramic relief, sculpture and functional ware.

Private and Semi Private Lessons available Wednesdays - Fridays

See Jena's work at jenadost.com

Follow on Instagram

Erin Drakford is co-founder and curator for the Arts Beacon Gallery and is our social media guru. She is a painter of vivid, colorful figures and the emotional complexities they mask. She is also a Mint Studio Artist.

See Erin's work at www.erindrakeford.com

Follow Erin on Instagram

Danielle Hanson’s mission is to create and facilitate wonder. She will be piloting our poetry program while she is in residence at Arts Beacon. Virtual classes are available for teens and adults.

Virtual poetry workshops and classes offered March though July.

See Danielle's work at www.daniellejhanson.com

Follow Danielle on Instagram

Katie is the leader of the kids art program and the photography program. She specializes in fun, wonkey and whimsical art including ceramics, silk paintings, and drawing. She offers multi media private and semi private lessons and small pod group classes to our artists 12 and under and photography for teens.

Lessons Available Tuesdays-Saturdays

See Katie's work at katielebel.com

Follow Katie on Instagram

Erin Wicker (erin T great) is an Arts Beacon Gallery co-founder and curator, administrator, and an artist/illustrator/muralist. There is a whimsical element to Erin’s work. She often incorporates natural found materials juxtaposed with bold colors and patterns. Erin has illustrated 3 children’s books and 1 not so children’s book. Her art has been featured on television (Extreme Makover: Home Edition 2010) and film.

See Erin's work at www.erintgreat.com

Follow Erin on Instagram

image_captions.text: I think I have found my inner artist using charcoal... I would have never known if it hadn't been for Jena.
"I ❤️ Arts Beacon. I don’t consider myself ‘arty’ but Jena made it awesome - her vibe of relaxed, cheerful guidance encouraged me to have a wonderful time."
"I absolutely recommend Arts Beacon. Jena is wonderful with children, and I will not hesitate to send own children and clients to her!"
"My 50th birthday party at Arts Beacon was the best! Jena’s easygoing style of teaching made everyone feel comfortable right from the start."
